items.name: Tonguelash
items.target: One creature or object per minion

effects.tier1: 2 damage; pull 1, or the tonguer can shift 1 square toward the target
effects.tier2: 4 damage; pull 2, or the tonguer shifts up to 2 squares toward the target
effects.tier3: 5 damage; pull 3, or the tonguer shifts up to 3 squares toward the target

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the forced movement or the shift leaves the target adjacent to the tonguer, the target is also grabbed.
While the tonguer has a tail, whenever they are grabbed, prone, slowed, or weakened, they can lose their tail to immediately end that condition, then shift up to 2 squares.
